statements: DELETE FROM misinformation_sources WHERE credibility_score < 5 AND flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_name = 'False News'
DELETE FROM misinformation_sources WHERE is_verified = false;
DELETE FROM flagged_entries WHERE flag_reason = 'Inaccurate Information';
DELETE FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'news outlet' AND flagged = TRUE
DELETE FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'social media' AND flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM comments WHERE comment_id IN (SELECT comment_id FROM comments WHERE flag_reason = 'inappropriate');
